data.title: Delivery is great and so is the food
data.text: I am skeptical when it comes to Chinese food as I have eaten some things that are gross. I am spoiled by my local Chinese restaurant. The food was good. Very flavorful. I didn't like the egg rolls but like I said I am spoiled by the local Chinese restaurant. Delivery person was nice. LOTS of food for what we got. They were also spot on for the amount of time it would take to get our food. What definitely go again when in the area.

data.title: Fantastic Chinese food - in Lincoln, Nebraska!
data.text:
While on a cross-country trek, we found ourselves spending the night in Lincoln, NE. Having not had a good Chinese meal since leaving Portland, we looked in a local directory, found Imperial Palace and thought we'd give it a try. The place was only open until 9:30pm that night and we wandered in around 9pm. What we found was a nicely-decorated, enormous restaurant that, at least at that hour, was nearly empty, so we started to think "what have we gotten ourselves in to?". Well, what we got ourselves in to was a GREAT Chinese restaurant. Service was very friendly and helpful, but we thought it wise to "stick with the basics". We ordered hot & sour soup, shrimp egg foo yung, braised string beans and a spicy chicken dish, served with brown rice - nothing fancy - but what we received were "best of" versions of everything we ordered! The EFY looked like a small volcano (big!), but was light, fluffy (like a great omelette) and packed with flavor. The string beans were amazing crunchy and flavorful - even the rice was fantastic - nutty, chewy and delicious on its own!. 
We were sad to leave and even sadder knowing that we wouldn't have access to this place any longer (as we live over 500 miles away). We're not ready to move to Lincoln, but we're very jealous of people who can go to Imperial Palace whenever they'd like.

data.title: Great Chinese Food
data.text: I have had a variety of Chinese food in many different places and the Imperial Palace is consistently the best.  The food has excellent flavor, is very large portions, and always hot and fresh.  The prices are very reasonable.  Always love to visit here.

data.title: Top 5 restaurants in Lincoln (in my humble opinion)- Very Authentic Chinese food
data.text: This is a great authentic Chinese restaurant. My roommate from China took me there some time ago and returning alone I was able to order the same dishes, which are quite different than American Chinese food, but infinitely better tasting. I got the co shway gee and braised green beans. Both were good, but the co shway gee, a cold chicken dish, was incredible. This is easily in my top 5 restaurants in Lincoln!

data.title: Good Chinese.
data.text: This is number 3 on my favorite Lincoln Chinese type restaurant list.  Prices are reasonable, and food is consistently good.  The atmosphere is a little more upscale than most Chinese restaurants.  This is a good place to take a family or group to eat and talk over lunch.

data.title: it's not awful
data.text:
I think we all know what kind of Chinese food I'm referencing in my title. Anyway, the food is usually underwhelming. I've had both vegetarian and chicken dishes here and the flavors are usually on the bland side--or it's just one flavor rather than a balance which is a real let down. However, I do love the rice and tea that are seemingly unlimited (not sure).

The service is great and the bathrooms are usually clean.

data.title: OK
data.text: this place was OK.  they used to be very good.  the last time I was there, they did not have as good of food as usual. it was OK, though.  I already eat at another Chinese place that has very good food.

data.title: It is Imperial Palace...spelled incorrectly here!
data.text: Prices more than most places. Seafood dish was so fishy, I thought it came out of salt creek. Another example of places not being able to withstand the chain prices. Not the crowd it used to get, and service not the same

data.title: old, worn out,
data.text: The food is poor, the owner a grump, the interior has seen better days. Avoid!

data.title: Another great place in Lincoln!
data.text: great food, great smiling servers, great atmosphere!

data.title: The best hot-sour soup in Lincoln!
data.text: The best hot-sour soup in Lincoln!
